rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 19 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:57 PM, 29 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Zambales, Bataan, Pampanga, Bulacan, Rizal, Batangas, Cavite and Metro Manila within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Laguna(Rizal, Nagcarlan, Liliw, San Pablo), Nueva Ecija(Carranglan) and Quezon(Calauag, Guinayangan, Tagkawayan, Burdeos) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
